name: Prototype: Top Down Shooter
description:
A fast prototype made in school over a 3 weeks period.

As it is a prototype there are of course a lot that needs to be polished, but any feed back is of course appreciated.

Know issues:
   - The procedural walk animation of the player can look wonky with low FPS.
   - Some sound effects can get cut off where they shouldn't.
   - The red close range enemies can at rare occasions get stuck searching for a suitable path towards the player.
